### Speakers  
Dr. Arti Garg (Founder of ESAL)

Along with the Office of Career & Professional Development, we are delighted to host Dr. Arti Garg, who will discuss her career and engagement opportunities at Engineers & Scientists Acting Locally, a national organization dedicated to increasing city, county, and state level engagement by professionals with backgrounds in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics (STEM).
